meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a kitten in playfulness or behavior.
meanings.sent1: The puppy's playful antics were kittenish in nature.
meanings.sent2: She had a kittenish way of batting her eyelashes when she was happy.
meanings.sent3: The kittenish behavior of the squirrel chasing its tail was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as kittenish as a kitten pouncing on a toy.
meanings.sent5: The child's giggles filled the room with a kittenish joy.

meanings.definition: Playful or flirtatious in a coy or coquettish manner.
meanings.sent1: His kittenish smile charmed everyone at the party.
meanings.sent2: She gave him a kittenish look before running off to play.
meanings.sent3: The kittenish wink she gave him made him blush.
meanings.sent4: Her kittenish behavior made it hard for him to resist her charm.
meanings.sent5: The dancer moved with a kittenish grace that captivated the audience.
